Ho aspettato parecchio per fare una recensione XD Il single player: oltre ai suoi ben fatti rompicapo, racconta la voglia di evadere di Chell e l' incontro con l'impacciato Wheatley doppiato da una bravissimo Stephen Merchant, che adoro. La storia si basa sulla presa di potere e come certi personaggi cambiano da una situazione all'altra. Glados (Ellen McLain) ha più carisma e lati nascosti. Le mappe create dai giocatori nel Workshop rendono il gioco longevo e sempre nuovo da scoprire, ci sono autori veramente bravi che creano nuove storie e rompicapo notevoli.
Unexpectedly enthralling in gameplay and story, simply genius

estou absolutamente sem palavras para descrever a incrível experiência que é esse jogo. a imersão é incrível, os gráficos são lindos para a época e envelheceram relativamente bem, a trilha sonora encaixa bem com o jogo e ajuda a complementar a sensação de frio na barriga, e a história é um deleite.
se você nunca jogou portal, recomendo que jogue o 1 e o 2 porque a experiência vale cada segundo, e o jogo por si só é muito divertido.

9/10

[b] Теперь можно быстро и удобно ходить за Балтикой [/b]

[h1] 77 даваний по cъeбaм из 10 [/h1]

Очень крутая игра, в основном это жанр головоломки, разбавленной хорошой озвучкой всех действующих персонажей (Уитли, Гладос, турели, дефектные турели, диктор на начальных уровнях), интересным сюжетом с неожиданным поворотом и хороошей графикой вместе с оптимизацией. Я серьёзно, графика по меркам 2021 года до сих пор остаётся очень проработанной и насыщенной. Но некоторые могут подумать "Эта игра у меня не потянет!". НЕТ! Это игра с очень хорошей оптимизацией, Valve тут очень постарались и поэтому Portal тянет на моей ноутбучной версии видеокарты Nvidia GeForce 1050. Очень классная игра, которую я хотел ещё с 5-ти лет!
Brain teasing, addictive and very entertaining. It took me twice as long (10h) to finish as the first Portal (5h). So lots of great and hilarious content!
BUENARDO!!!!

Gran juego, si eres una persona que le gusta resolver problemas y te gusta analizar bien los entornos, si es asi este es tu juego. te recomiendo primero jugar el 1 pues este es la continucación. tiene muy buena historia y me encantan sus personajes. GLaDos Wheatey por ejemplo son dos personajes muy comicos de la historia. 

El Cooperativo es mi parte favorita, puedes jugar con 1 amigo o desconocido que te ayudara a resolver los problemas y pruebas establecidas, jugaran como 2 droides llamados  ATLAS y BODY.

Fun game, though I didn't really like it as much as the first game. There were too many puzzles where I was really confused usually because the room was too big to clearly see where I was supposed to portal to, or where I needed to place gel. The amount of new mechanics were nice, and though I really had fun with the gel, the gel puzzles were probably the ones that took me the longest to figure out because of how few directions they gave with them, as well as how the gel can go almost anywhere. Still a great game regardless, the story was good, the test chambers parts were nice, and I had a great time.
Gozu, ga

"Oh... It's you.
It's been a long time. How have you been?
I've been really busy being dead. You know, after you MURDERED ME.
Okay. Look. We both said a lot of things that you're going to regret. But I think we can put our differences behind us. For science. You monster.
I will say, though, that since you went to all the trouble of waking me up, you must really, really love to test.
I love it too. There's just one small thing we need to take care of first..."

Portal 2 has to be my favourite game of all time. It is also one of the best Valve games and one of the best video game sequels of all time.

This game takes everything the first game was good at and improves and adds upon it a lot. Gameplay-wise it is still one of the best puzzle games out there, but this time with a great story, great humour and incredible worldbuilding.
 
I would recommend this game to anyone who is even slightly interested in puzzle games.
